name: VSTSToolsStopBuild
description: Conditionally stops a build based on selected input values and a comparison operator.
author: Moonspace Labs, LLC
helpMarkDown: Conditionally stops a build based on selected input values and a comparison operator.

inputs.name: leftOperand
inputs.label: Left Item to Compare
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the item to be compared aginst the 'Right Item' based on the selected operand. For example, to compare current branch name, use $(Build.SourceBranchName).

inputs.name: rightOperand
inputs.label: Right Item to Compare
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the item to be compared aginst the 'Left Item' based on the selected operand.
